name: dotlr
description: An LR(1) parser generator and visualizer created for educational purposes.

scripts.build: npm i -g wasm-pack && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run build-wasm:no-test && npm run build-lib
scripts.build-wasm: cd .. && cargo test && wasm-pack build --out-dir bindings/typescript/src/pkg --out-name dotlr --features wasm --no-default-features
scripts.build-wasm:no-test: cd .. && wasm-pack build --out-dir bindings/typescript/src/pkg --out-name dotlr --features wasm --no-default-features
